trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000010_NANAMO<tab>Let all here present attest that Ser Aymeric, acting on behalf of the archbishop, has appended his signature.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000020_NANAMO<tab>I do hereby declare...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000030_NANAMO<tab>That from this day forth, the Holy See of Ishgard shall once more be counted a member of the Eorzean Alliance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000040_NANAMO<tab>Let our nations move forward as one, and stand united against the Garlean Empire!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000050_AYMERIC<tab>For the future of Eorzea!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000060_RAUBAHNMERLWYBKANESENNA<tab>For the future of Eorzea!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000070_ALPHINAUD<tab>There you are.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>A noble monument to a noble soul.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000090_TATARU<tab>From here, Lord Haurchefant can watch over all of Ishgard...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been a long and arduous journey. And we have lost much and more along the way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet come what may, we must stay true to our purpose and press on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000120_TATARU<tab>That's right, you two! It's high time we got back to rebuilding the Scions!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000130_TATARU<tab>Which means we're going to need money─and lots of it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000140_EDMONT<tab>So ends a glorious chapter in their tale.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000150_EDMONT<tab>However, tumultuous days yet lie ahead for Ishgard.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000160_EDMONT<tab>After a thousand years under the yoke of the church, the people take their first tentative steps into the unknown.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000170_EDMONT<tab>And though they spy a glimmer of peace upon the horizon, Nidhogg's vengeful shadow yet remains to darken the way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000180_EDMONT<tab>Be that as it may...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000190_EDMONT<tab>So long as the young commander of the Temple Knights and his heroic companions are there to guide them, the people may hold fast to hope─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000200_EDMONT<tab>the hope that, one day, true peace will return to Ishgard, and that man and dragon may live in harmony once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000210_EDMONT<tab>Let the deeds writ herein never be forgot,
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_000220_EDMONT<tab>that they may inspire generations yet unborn to strive ever heavensward.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100010_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>So Lahabrea and Igeyorhm have fallen.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100020_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Bested by mortals in their attempt to initiate the eighth Rejoining. That they should be so complacent...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100030_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>And now it falls to me to deal with the consequences...<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100050_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Without intervention, the balance between Light and Darkness will begin to shift, placing our mission in jeopardy.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100060_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Hydaelyn's champion has grown too strong. <var 08 E905 ((Her)) ((His)) /var> might encroaches upon the realm of gods.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100070_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Equilibrium must needs be restored. The time is come for you and yours to join the fray...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_100080_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)<var 48 F20223 /var>...Warrior of Darkness.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_200010_CID<tab>Remind me: why is there no rest for the righteous?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_200020_YSHTOLA<tab>Because they <var 1A 02 /var>care<var 1A 01 /var>, Master Garlond.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03008_200030_CID<tab>Of all the things they could have picked to play with... That's not a toy, you bloody fools─it's a primal!
